Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Clarifies provisions related to the overtime ceiling for corrections officers of the Westchester county correction department
Summary: Clarifies provisions related to the overtime ceiling for correction officers of the Westchester county correction department for the purposes of retirement benefits.
LawCode: Amd ยง601, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the overtime ceiling for correction officers of the Westchester county correction department
